description.value:
Allows character to ignore Critical Effects for 1d10 Rounds. Power Armour injectors of these by default which can be refilled with +10 Tech-Use Test.

Requirements

Astartes Grade Drugs require +10 Medicae Test if adminstered to humans, failing administers anyway but also causes 1d5 Fatigue and 1 Round of Stun.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 10 R
